original_text: And when the captains of the chariots saw that it was not the king of Israel, they turned back from pursuing him.
korean_text: 병거의 지휘관들이 그가 이스라엘의 왕이 아님을 보고 쫓기를 그치고 돌이켰더라

sentences.original_text: And when the captains of the chariots saw that it was not the king of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 병거의 장관들이 그가 이스라엘 왕이 아닌 것을 보고,

sentences.original_text: they turned back from pursuing him.
